question: You are planning a short visit to a city where one of your relatives lives.Write a letter to your relative. In your letter:• Explain when and how long you will be in town.• Ask whether you can stay at their home.• Offer to pay for yourself.
text: I hope this letter finds you in good health. I am very joyful to tell you that I'm planning a short visit to Delhi due to my official training.

It will be a three-day training programme related to Tally software which will start on the 2nd of August. Thus, I'll reach by the 1st of August in the evening and back home on the evening of the 4th of August.

I was a little bit worried about accommodation because it will be not provided by the organization. So, I want to ask you whether I can stay at your home if you feel this will not cause any inconvenience to you and your family.
I wish to stay with you so that we can share some quality time after finishing my work hours. Apart from that, I can also pay for using this facility. I can't wait to see you and enjoy your company.
Pay regards to your family from my side.
